verses.verse: But <WG1161> of <WG4012> the times <WG5550> and <WG2532> the seasons <WG2540>, brethren <WG80>, ye have <WG2192> <WG5719> no <WG3756> need <WG5532> that I write <WG1125> <WG5745> unto you <WG5213>.

For <WG1063> yourselves <WG846> know <WG1492> <WG5758> perfectly <WG199> that <WG3754> the day <WG2250> of the YY <WG2962> so <WG3779> cometh <WG2064> <WG5736> as <WG5613> a thief <WG2812> in <WG1722> the night <WG3571>.

For <WG1063> when <WG3752> they shall say <WG3004> <WG5725>, Peace <WG1515> and <WG2532> safety <WG803>; then <WG5119> sudden <WG160> destruction <WG3639> cometh upon <WG2186> <WG5731> them <WG846>, as <WG5618> travail <WG5604> upon <WG1722> a woman with child <WG1064> <WG2192> <WG5723>; and <WG2532> they shall <WG1628> not <WG3364> escape <WG1628> <WG5632>.

But <WG1161> ye <WG5210>, brethren <WG80>, are <WG2075> <WG5748> not <WG3756> in <WG1722> darkness <WG4655>, that <WG2443> that day <WG2250> should overtake <WG2638> <WG5632> you <WG5209> as <WG5613> a thief <WG2812>.

Ye <WG5210> are <WG2075> <WG5748> all <WG3956> the children <WG5207> of light <WG5457>, and <WG2532> the children <WG5207> of the day <WG2250>: we are <WG2070> <WG5748> not <WG3756> of the night <WG3571>, nor <WG3761> of darkness <WG4655>.

Therefore <WG686> <WG3767> let us <WG2518> not <WG3361> sleep <WG2518> <WG5725>, as <WG5613> <WG2532> do others <WG3062>; but <WG235> let us watch <WG1127> <WG5725> and <WG2532> be sober <WG3525> <WG5725>.
For <WG1063> they that sleep <WG2518> <WG5723> sleep <WG2518> <WG5719> in the night <WG3571>; and <WG2532> they that be drunken <WG3182> <WG5746> are drunken <WG3184> <WG5719> in the night <WG3571>.

But <WG1161> let <WG3525> us <WG2249>, who are <WG5607> <WG5752> of the day <WG2250>, be sober <WG3525> <WG5725>, putting on <WG1746> <WG5671> the breastplate <WG2382> of faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26>; and <WG2532> for an helmet <WG4030>, the hope <WG1680> of salvation <WG4991>.

For <WG3754> 'Elohim <WG2316> hath <WG5087> not <WG3756> appointed <WG5087> <WG5639> us <WG2248> to <WG1519> wrath <WG3709>, but <WG235> to <WG1519> obtain <WG4047> salvation <WG4991> by <WG1223> our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>,

Who <WG3588> died <WG599> <WG5631> for <WG5228> us <WG2257>, that <WG2443>, whether <WG1535> we wake <WG1127> <WG5725> or <WG1535> sleep <WG2518> <WG5725>, we should live <WG2198> <WG5661> together <WG260> with <WG4862> him <WG846>.
Wherefore <WG1352> comfort <WG3870> <WG5720> yourselves together <WG240>, and <WG2532> edify <WG3618> <WG5720> one <WG1520> another <WG1520>, even <WG2531> as also <WG2532> ye do <WG4160> <WG5719>.

And <WG1161> we beseech <WG2065> <WG5719> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, to know <WG1492> <WG5760> them which <WG3588> labour <WG2872> <WG5723> among <WG1722> you <WG5213>, and <WG2532> are over <WG4291> <WG5734> you <WG5216> in <WG1722> the YY <WG2962>, and <WG2532> admonish <WG3560> <WG5723> you <WG5209>;

And <WG2532> to esteem <WG2233> <WG5738> them <WG846> very <WG5228> highly <WG1537> <WG4053> in <WG1722> love <WG26> for <WG1223> their <WG846> work's sake <WG2041>. And be at peace <WG1514> <WG5720> among <WG1722> yourselves <WG1438>.

Now <WG1161> we exhort <WG3870> <WG5719> you <WG5209>, brethren <WG80>, warn <WG3560> <WG5720> them that are unruly <WG813>, comfort <WG3888> <WG5737> the feebleminded <WG3642>, support <WG472> <WG5737> the weak <WG772>, be patient <WG3114> <WG5720> toward <WG4314> all <WG3956> men.

See <WG3708> <WG5720> that none <WG3361> <WG5100> render <WG591> <WG5632> evil <WG2556> for <WG473> evil <WG2556> unto any <WG5100> man; but <WG235> ever <WG3842> follow <WG1377> <WG5720> that which <WG3588> is good <WG18>, both <WG2532> among <WG1519> yourselves <WG240>, and <WG2532> to <WG1519> all <WG3956> men.
Rejoice <WG5463> <WG5720> evermore <WG3842>.
Pray <WG4336> <WG5737> without ceasing <WG89>.

In <WG1722> every thing <WG3956> give thanks <WG2168> <WG5720>: for <WG1063> this <WG5124> is the will <WG2307> of 'Elohim <WG2316> in <WG1722> Moshiach <WG5547> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> concerning <WG1519> you <WG5209>.
Quench <WG4570> <WG5720> not <WG3361> the Spirit <WG4151>.
Despise <WG1848> <WG5720> not <WG3361> prophesyings <WG4394>.
Prove <WG1381> <WG5720> all things <WG3956>; hold fast <WG2722> <WG5720> that which <WG3588> is good <WG2570>.
Abstain <WG567> <WG5732> from <WG575> all <WG3956> appearance <WG1491> of evil <WG4190>.

And <WG1161> the very <WG846> 'Elohim <WG2316> of peace <WG1515> sanctify <WG37> <WG5659> you <WG5209> wholly <WG3651>; and <WG2532> I pray 'Elohim your <WG5216> whole <WG3648> spirit <WG4151> and <WG2532> soul <WG5590> and <WG2532> body <WG4983> be preserved <WG5083> <WG5684> blameless <WG274> unto <WG1722> the coming <WG3952> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547>.
Faithful <WG4103> is he that calleth <WG2564> <WG5723> you <WG5209>, who <WG3739> also <WG2532> will do <WG4160> <WG5692> it.
Brethren <WG80>, pray <WG4336> <WG5737> for <WG4012> us <WG2257>.
Greet <WG782> <WG5663> all <WG3956> the brethren <WG80> with <WG1722> an holy <WG40> kiss <WG5370>.
I charge <WG3726> <WG5719> you <WG5209> by the YY <WG2962> that this epistle <WG1992> be read <WG314> <WG5683> unto all <WG3956> the holy <WG40> brethren <WG80>.

The grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> YY <WG2962> Yeshuw`a <WG2424> Moshiach <WG5547> be with <WG3326> you <WG5216>. Amen <WG281>. The first <WG4413> epistle to <WG4314> the Thessalonians <WG2331> was written <WG1125> <WG5648> from <WG575> Athens <WG116>.
